name: Polzun
description:
This is an arcade in the style of adventure.
In the game you are waiting for a sufficient number of levels, on which you will meet enemies who want to stop you!
You will have to confront them by playing for the main character, which you can disguise, and in the future and choose other characters.
This is a 2D game with a side view where you control your character Features: [/ h2]
-Simplicity
-Achievements
-Quality graphics and music
